image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from New Jersey; born in Flint, Genessee County, Mich., November 27, 1973; graduated from Carman-Ainsworth High School, Flint, Mich.; attended University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Mich., 1992-1995; attended University of Pennsylvania, Wharton School of Business, Philadelphia, Pa.; professional athlete; television commentator; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2011-January 3, 2015); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014.
